title: Cannot Browse despite having internet connection
content: Firefox will no longer loads any webpages. I uninstalled and installed again and it worked for a few hours and then again stopped loading pages. I am now using Microsoft Edge since last night and it works perfectly. I have checked in Bitdefender and Firefox is approved on my system. My internet connection is working fine on my tablet just not a my laptop.
creator: karl.wearne

title: Incessant Update Notifications
content: I want to find out how to stop incessant update notifications on a MacBook Pro. Respectfully, please no lectures about just going ahead and updating or how I should keep my browser updated. We all make personal choices about how we want to manage our technology. I googled this first and found so many other people asking the same question, but no firm solutions. As you know, in preferences I have the option to allow automatic updates or to first be asked before updating, but it's a Morgan's Fork. If you don't allow automatic updates - which is out of the question - then they are going to bug the pee out of you until you update. That makes me dig my heels in deeper. Either I find a way to turn off these annoying notifications or I am done with Firefox. Any assistance will be greatly appreciated.
creator: kinggeorgewhatever

title: How do I remove the "email image..." option from the context menu?
content:
How do I remove the "email image..." option from the context menu? There are some technical solutions people are posting that involve a lot of editing and I don't really understand them at all.

There are also some links to extensions that have been since removed.
creator: phantomdotexe

title: Blocked Download wont go away.
content: I have persistent spam-ware type download that wont go away. I have deleted it but every time I restart Firefox it comes back and pops up saying "This File may harm your Computer" but i can't complete the download or remove it permanently. i have tried uninstalling and reinstalling Firefox several times and it has not worked how can i get rid of this? Thank you OSX Firefox V87.0 64-bit
creator: rlitzner

title: Signing In
content: I switched to Firefox as my browser a few days ago and I am so tired of signing to Firefox and gmail and all my other favorites sites EVERY time. Why doesn't Firefox remember me?
creator: cckeefe
